testcase.name: configureAppium

error.message:
Appium HTTP server has started and is listening although we were unable to get an OK response from http://127.0.0.1:4723/status. Make sure both the client and the server use the same base path '/' and check the server log for possible error messages occurrences. Response status code: 404 Response payload:

HTTP Error 404. The requested resource is not found.

Not Found

Not Found Node.js executable path: C:\Program Files\nodejs\node.exe Arguments: [C:\Users\ShahzebAhmadShah\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\appium\build\lib\main.js, --port, 4723, --address, 127.0.0.1]
